00029 class simbio_table_field
00030 {
00031     public $attr;
00032     public $value;
00033 
00039     public function __construct($str_attr = '')
00040     {
00041         $this->attr = $str_attr;
00042     }
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00055 class simbio_table_row
00056 {
00057     public $attr;
00058     public $fields = array();
00059     public $all_cell_attr;
00060 
00066     public function __construct($array_field_content, $str_attr = '')
00067     {
00068         $this->attr = $str_attr;
00069         $this->addFields($array_field_content);
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00079     public function addFields($array_field_content)
00080     {
00081         foreach ($array_field_content as $idx => $fld_content) {
00082             $_field_obj = new simbio_table_field();
00083             $_field_obj->value = $fld_content;
00084             $this->fields[$idx] = $_field_obj;
00085         }
00086     }
00087 }
00088 
00099 class simbio_table
00100 {
00101     public $table_attr = '';
00102     public $table_header_attr = '';
00103     public $table_content_attr = '';
00104     public $table_row = array();
00105     public $cell_attr = array();
00106     public $highlight_row = false;
00107 
00113     public function __construct($str_table_attr = '')
00114     {
00115         $this->table_attr = $str_table_attr;
00116     }
00117 
00118 
00125     public function setHeader($array_column_content)
00126     {
00127         if (!is_array($array_column_content)) {
00128             // do nothing
00129             return;
00130         } else {
00131             $this->table_row[0] = new simbio_table_row($array_column_content);
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135 
00142     public function appendTableRow($array_column_content)
00143     {
00144         // row content must be an array
00145         if (!is_array($array_column_content)) {
00146             // do nothing
00147             return;
00148         } else {
00149             // records row must start with index 1 not 0
00150             // index 0 is reserved for table header row
00151             $_row_cnt = count($this->table_row);
00152             // create instance of simbio_table_row
00153             $_row_obj = new simbio_table_row($array_column_content);
00154             if ($_row_cnt < 1) {
00155                 $this->table_row[1] = $_row_obj;
00156             } else {
00157                 // if header row exists
00158                 if (isset($this->table_row[0])) {
00159                     $this->table_row[$_row_cnt] = $_row_obj;
00160                 } else {
00161                     $this->table_row[$_row_cnt+1] = $_row_obj;
00162                 }
00163             }
00164         }
00165     }
00166 
00167 
00176     public function setColumnContent($int_row, $int_column, $str_column_content)
00177     {
00178         if (!isset($this->table_row[$int_row]->fields[$int_column])) {
00179            // do nothing
00180            return;
00181         } else {
00182            $this->table_row[$int_row]->fields[$int_column]->value = $str_column_content;
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00186 
00187 
00196     public function getColumnContent($int_row, $int_column, $str_column_content)
00197     {
00198         if (isset($this->table_row[$int_row]->fields[$int_column])) {
00199             return $this->table_row[$int_row]->fields[$int_column]->value;
00200         } else {
00201             return null;
00202         }
00203     }
00204 
00205 
00214     public function setCellAttr($int_row = 0, $int_column = null, $str_column_attr)
00215     {
00216         if (is_null($int_column)) {
00217             $this->table_row[$int_row]->all_cell_attr = $str_column_attr;
00218         } else {
00219             $this->cell_attr[$int_row][$int_column] = $str_column_attr;
00220         }
00221     }
00222 
00223 
00229     public function printTable()
00230     {
00231         $_buffer = '<table '.$this->table_attr.'>'."\n";
00232 
00233         // check if the array have a records
00234         if (count($this->table_row) < 1) {
00235             $_buffer .= '<tr><td align="center" style="color: red; background-color: #CCCCCC;">'.__('No Data').'</td></tr>';
00236         } else {
00237             // set header style if exist
00238             $this->setCellAttr(0, null, $this->table_header_attr);
00239 
00240             // records
00241             $_record_row = 0;
00242             foreach ($this->table_row as $_row_idx => $_row) {
00243                 if (!$_row instanceof simbio_table_row) {
00244                     continue;
00245                 }
00246                 // check for row highlights
00247                 if ($this->highlight_row AND $_row_idx > 0) {
00248                     // higlight row special attributes
00249                     $_row->attr .= ' id="row'.$_record_row.'" onmouseover="highlightRow(\'row'.$_record_row.'\')" onmouseout="unHighlightRow(\'row'.$_record_row.'\')"';
00250                 }
00251                 // print out the row objects
00252                 $_buffer .= '<tr '.$_row->attr.'>';
00253                 foreach ($_row->fields as $_field_idx => $_field) {
00254                     if ($_row->all_cell_attr) {
00255                         $_field->attr = $_row->all_cell_attr;
00256                     }
00257                     if (isset($this->cell_attr[$_row_idx][$_field_idx])) {
00258                         $_field->attr = $this->cell_attr[$_row_idx][$_field_idx];
00259                     }
00260                     $_buffer .= '<td '.$_field->attr.'>'.$_field->value.'</td>';
00261                 }
00262                 $_buffer .= '</tr>'."\n";
00263                 $_record_row++;
00264             }
00265         }
00266 
00267         $_buffer .= '</table>'."\n";
00268         return $_buffer;
00269     }
00270 }
